text: śrī-kṛṣṇa-chaitanya prabhu jīve dayā kori’ svapārṣada svīya dhāma saha avatari
translation: Being gracious upon the jīva -souls, Along with Your associates and abode

text: atyanta durlabha prema koribāre dāna śikhāya saraṇāgati bhakatera prāṇa
translation: the love divine most rare; By teaching exclusive surrender,
the life and soul of the devotee

text: dainya, ātmanivedana, goptṛtve varaṇa ‘avaśya rakṣibe kṛṣṇa’—viśvāsa pālana
translation: Embracing His guardianship, ‘Krishna will certainly protect me’—

text: bhakti-anukūla mātra kārjera svīkāra bhakti-pratikūla bhāva—varjanāṅgīkāra
translation: Embracing rejection of adversity to devotion.
Those who surrender in this sixfold way—
by the divine son of Nanda.

text: rūpa-sanātana-pade dante tṛṇa kori’ bhakativinoda poḍe dui pada dhori’
translation: Taking in his mouth a straw, falling
at the lotus feet of Śrī Rūpa-Sanātan; Śrī Bhakti Vinod clasps their holy lotus feet.

text: kā̐diyā kā̐diyā bole, āmi to’ adhama śikhāye śaraṇāgati karahe uttama
translation: Weeping, weeping, I implore thee, ‘O I am afallen!
Please teach me to surrender, teach me pure devotion.’
